articles.title: Biden delivers remarks on coronavirus amid Delta variant fears, missed vaccination goal - WGN TV Chicago
articles.description: President Joe Biden will deliver remarks Tuesday on the United States vaccination program, just days after the country failed to meet his goal to have 70% of American adults at least partially vaccinated by July 4.
